sourcesContent:
import './PersonalInfo.css' import { useState } from 'react' function PersonalInfo({ state, Dispatch,theName,setName}) { const [FormData, setFormData] = useState({ username: "", mail: "", phoneNumber:"" }) function handleName(e) { setFormData({ ...FormData, username: e.target.value }) } function blur() { state.NameLength=FormData.username } return (

Personal info

Please provide your name, email address, and phone number.

handleName(e)} onBlur={() => blur()} name='fullName' type='text' id='name' className={`p-md-3 mb-md-2 mb-2 p-2 ${state.Alert}`} placeholder='e.g ds King' /> {state.nameError }
setFormData({...FormData,mail:e.target.value})} name='email' type='text' id='mail' className='p-md-3 mb-md-2 p-2 mb-2' placeholder='e.g. stephenking@lorem.com'/>
setFormData({...FormData,phoneNumber:e.target.value})} name='phoneNumber' type='text' id='phone' className='p-md-3 p-2' placeholder='e.g. +1 234 567 890'/>
) } export default PersonalInfo
